definition: to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: The critical speed of one turbopump rotor on elastic support was computed by FEMQZ.
sentences.chinese: 计算分析了某涡轮泵转子在弹性支承下的临界转速。

sentences.english: A conjecture of super-universality of the dynamical critical exponent Z is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一个关于临界动力学指数Z的超普适性猜想。

sentences.english: The more the fiber volume fraction is, the lower the critical temperature T crit .
sentences.chinese: 纤维体积分数越大，所需临界转变温度越低。

sentences.english: Iron at temperatures close to and above its critical temperature has an affinity for carbon.
sentences.chinese: 铁在靠近并高于其临界温度时对碳具有亲合力。

sentences.english: But the influence of cooling water flow rate upon the condenser's TTD has a critical value.
sentences.chinese: 冷却水流量时凝汽器端差影响存在临界值。

sentences.english: The critical condition of its dynamic recrystallization has been established by linear regression.
sentences.chinese: 建立了试验用钢的动态再结晶临界条件回归方程。

sentences.english: Is your code re-entrant or do you have critical section that must be locked?
sentences.chinese: 您的代码是可重入的，还是设置必须锁定的临界区呢？

sentences.english: Our results cannot prove whether we have passed a tipping point or not.
sentences.chinese: 我们的研究结果不能证实我们是否已经通过了临界点。

sentences.english: Clarify the oil painting art language real meaning and the existence values of the critical appearance.
sentences.chinese: 阐明油画艺术语言临界状态的真正意义和存在价值。

sentences.english: The control of supercritical airfoil boundary layer separation is adapted using micro-vortex generators.
sentences.chinese: 超临界翼型附面层分离控制适合采用微型涡流发生器。

sentences.english: Perhaps because self-organised criticality is the perfect starting point for many of the brain's functions.
sentences.chinese: 可能因为自我组织临界是许多脑功能的完美始点。

sentences.english: It seems that no connection to the critical phenomenon of concerned system exists.
sentences.chinese: 但理论关联行为的导出与临界现象似乎没有联系。

sentences.english: Is there some set-point which when crossed unleashes the evil?
sentences.chinese: 有没有一个临界点，当它被跨过之后就会释放出邪恶？

sentences.english: The first one is a modified critical dissipative Quasi-Geostrophic equation.
sentences.chinese: 第一个是一类修正的临界耗散准地转方程。

sentences.english: The supercritical water oxidation(SCWO) is a kind of promising waste water treatment method.
sentences.chinese: 超临界水氧化法是一种很有前途的废水处理方法。

definition: low velocity zone (seismology)/also called asthenosphere 軟流層|软流层[ruan3 liu2 ceng2]
